title: Victorious Ward skin
body: Is there going to be a victorious ward skin this season, and if there is, what requirements do I have to meet to qualify for it. I've looked on a few websites that say you have to be silver in two or more queues but I haven't seen any official riot information about it or any pictures of what the ward might look like. Thanks for your help.

replies.body:
https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/end-season-rewards-2018

There's nothing on the rewards page RE Victorious ward skins, though there was one last year. It's possible Honour wards are going to take their place, or we will get both again, though given nothing is mentioned on the reward page, it seems likely there isn't one this year.

Last year you had to be Silver+ in 2+ queues to receive the Victorious ward skin. If they do one this year I imagine the requirements will remain the same.
